DOC.brief_summary: A 12-week study ass LIK066 effect body weight diabetic , prediabetics normoglycemic patient elevate body mass index ( BMI )
DOC.brief_title: Effect LIK066 Body Weight Patients With Elevated Body Mass Index
DOC.criteria: Subjects stable health condition determine past medical history , physical examination , electrocardiogram , laboratory test screen . Patients dysglycemia patient : Fasting plasma glucose > 100mg/dL ( 5.6 mmol/L ) , HbA1c > 5.7 % < 10 % screening . Fasting plasma glucose ≤250mg/dL ( 13.9 mmol/L ) screening . If treat antidiabetic medication ( prohibited medication ) , patient must stable dose 12 week prior randomization maintain dose end study . Subjects must body mass index ( BMI ) within range 35 50 kg/m2 screening , stable body weight ( ± 5 kg ) within 3 month prior screen Preexisting , clinically significant gastrointestinal , liver , cardiovascular , renal chronic medical condition consider serious unstable , stable cardiovascular disease , treat hypertension , dyslipidemia stable chronic disorder Clinically significant GI disorder relate malabsorption may affect drug glucose absorption history significant gastrointestinal surgery could affect intestinal glucose absorption Enrollment diet , weight loss exercise program specific intent lose weight , within 3 month prior randomization , clinical diagnosis eat disorder Pregnant nursing ( lactate ) woman , woman childbearing potential Other inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply
DOC.keyword: dysglycemic , normoglycemic , prediabetes , type 2 diabetes mellitus
